text:
@TCPigott @GOPChairwoman It took Trump 70 days from that initial notification of COVID19 to treat the coronavirus seriously. 70 DAYS. We had more expertise, resources, plans and epidemiological experience than dozens of countries that ultimately fared far better in fending off the virus.

FIRE TRUMP.
